QuestData.Title: Tormenting the Softknuckles
QuestData.Description: Slave thing!$B$BRakjak want me to babysit you while I kill hardknuckles. I feeling generous today, so I let you kill some too, but don't get in Goregek's way!$B$BRakjak not know yet, but Goregek has eye on big bad hardknuckle mama. We go to Hardknuckle Clearing to east and poke softknuckles with poker and she sure to come yelling!$B$B<Goregek rubs his hands together gleefully.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Goregek has given you a Softknuckle Poker for use on Softknuckles to draw the Hardknuckle Matriarch out of hiding. Slay the Hardknuckle Matriarch and report her death to High-Shaman Rajak at Frenzyheart Hill.$B$BIf you lose Goregek's Shackles, speak to Elder Harkek in Frenzyheart Hill.
QuestData.RewardText: Goregek take you to kill big mom of hardknuckles, eh? You lucky!$B$BDumb softknuckles squeal good!$B$B<Rakjak squeals loudly and breaks out laughing.>
